entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
